data.comment: Andres Reyes (Miami) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The match has started at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Orlando have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Rodolfo Pizarro (Miami) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 5, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a Orlando throw-in in Miami's half.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Miami will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Orlando.
At Inter Miami CF Stadium, Leandro Gonzalez Pirez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Orlando are pushing forward but Nani's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Daryl Dike is on target to give Orlando a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 12, Great play from Antonio Carlos to set up the goal.
Orlando have a goal kick.
Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Important block from the Orlando defence as Rodolfo Pizarro fires in a strike for Miami.
Corner awarded to Miami.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 19, Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
Ruan is back on the pitch.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ruan for Orlando who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 21, Free kick in a good position for Miami!
Lewis Morgan (Miami) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Miami.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of Miami.
Rodolfo Pizarro for Miami has been booked by Allen Chapman and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 24, Allen Chapman awards Miami a goal kick.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Goal kick for Orlando at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Miami in the half of Orlando.
Throw-in Orlando.
Throw-in for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 29, Free kick Miami.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Miami.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
In Fort Lauderdale Miami drive forward through Matias Pellegrini. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 34, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Andres Perea of Orlando gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a Miami throw-in in Orlando's half.
In the minute 37, In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Goal kick for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 38, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Miami's Ben Sweat gets in a shot on goal at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 40, Miami have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Orlando have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Miami.
Miami's Lewis Morgan is on target but unsuccessful.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 44, Miami's Blaise Matuidi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Fort Lauderdale.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of Miami.
Free kick Miami.
In the minute 45, Allen Chapman awards Orlando a goal kick.
The first-half is over.
Own goal! Robin Jansson has scored at the wrong end to make it 1-1.
Allen Chapman has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Miami have a goal kick.
Rodolfo Pizarro (Miami) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 47, Nicolas Figal (Miami) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 49, Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of Miami.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 50, Allen Chapman awards Orlando a goal kick.
In Fort Lauderdale, Rodolfo Pizarro of Miami is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 54, Miami's Julian Carranza goes close with a header against the bar.
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Orlando at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Miami.
Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Orlando at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Tesho Akindele is on a sub for Jhegson Mendez for Orlando.
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Orlando in the half of Miami.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Junior Urso (Orlando) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 63, Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 67, In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fort Lauderdale.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 69, Free kick Miami.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
The home team have replaced Matias Pellegrini with Juan Agudelo. This is the first substitution made today by Diego Alonso.
In the minute 72, Allen Chapman awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Orlando.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 73, Throw-in Miami.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Allen Chapman awards Miami a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
Robbie Robinson is replacing Julian Carranza for the home team.
The away team replace Chris Mueller with Benji Michel.
In the minute 77, Joey Dezart is replacing Daryl Dike for Orlando at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Diego Alonso is making the team's third substitution at Inter Miami CF Stadium with Victor Ulloa replacing Wil Trapp.
In the minute 81, Diego Alonso (Miami) is making a fourth substitution, with Brek Shea replacing Ben Sweat.
Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 84, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Orlando.
Orlando drive upfield and Nani gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Miami defender.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Orlando at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Orlando's Ruan has been booked in Fort Lauderdale.
Tesho Akindele (Orlando) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 88, Orlando have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Benji Michel gets his shot on target but fails to score for Orlando.
Allen Chapman signals a Miami throw-in in Orlando's half.
In the minute 89, Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for Miami, close to Orlando's area.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Goal! A Leandro Gonzalez Pirez header gives Miami a 2-1 lead in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 89, Lewis Morgan with an assist there.
Allen Chapman will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of Miami.
Miami have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Fort Lauderdale. The final score is 2-1.
The away team have replaced Andres Perea with Matheus Aias. This is the fourth substitution made today by Oscar Pareja.
Nani (Orlando) gets a yellow card.
Juan Agudelo (Miami) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
John McCarthy is booked for the home team.
